> <OLD>
>
> Nightligh was in a semiconcious state, barely she noticed Stampy,'s foot
> twitched, she tried to save energy and standing as best as she could the
> pain

<NEW>

In the corner with her SHARPEDGE was also finally beginning to stir,
evidently his self repair circuits finally kicking in. His optics
flickered, but he obviously was not fully conscious or aware.

STAMPY continued to lay still, his vitals at a low ebb.

> <OLD>
>
> Tucson narrows his brow with a coy smirk, and transforms back into his
> beast mode.   Yet he remains on two hind legs.  His body perfectly
> balanced and his stance nimble as that of a master ninja.  His long tail
> remains coiled neatly behind him, never getting in his way of his feet.
>
> " Rodimus, what am I going to do with you?  Well then, if you think you
> can beat me then why haven't you made your move?  Oh that's right, your
> puppet master won't let you.  If you think you're all that, come on, try
> me, I'm wide open."

<NEW>

As soon as the shield dropped the SHARKTICONS began to open fire -
laser rifles spewing out energy in all directions!

The FUZORS on both sides were the first ones to come under their fire,
their cutting blasts causing them to have to veer off!

Then the other Dinosaur soldiers that MAGMATRON was deploying began to
wade into the battle, their laser cannons also sweeping across the
PREDACONS and MAXIMALS!

MAGMATRON stepped foward, "If you are so eager to fight someone, fight
ME!" He said. With the infusion of power he had received, he had
grown, his optics dark yet somehow still crimson. Standing at about 20
feet tall he dwarfed everyone in the room!

LEO PRIME and BIG CONVOY also were running up beside TUSCON.

"Our first priority is saving Optimus and destroying this place!" LEO
PRIME said.

BIG CONVOY grunted, "And then we can avenge our men!" He also saw
SHARPEDGE and STAMPY on the ground along with NIGHTLIGHT.

With a casual movement MAGMATRON pointed at TUSCON and then opened his
hand, sending a large sweeping stream of plasma at the all three -
TUSCON, LEO and CONVOY!

Meanwhile CRYOTEK ignored the battle at large and flew at SABERBACK
and OPTIMUS PRIME, the later of whom still hung suspended over the
large pit, his armor as black as pitch, seemingly burned by that black
fire.

SABERBACK was standing on a bridge that spanned the pit looking up at
OPTIMUS as CRYOTEK flew over!

CRYOTEK had some sort of dagger in his hand, it looked to made of crystal!

OOC: As a note - Optimus has been shrunk like everyone else, he is
roughly 15'+ tall or so

(TAG)

- Preston
